LanguageData.GR_HumanoidHybrids_Forbidden.label: forbidden
LanguageData.GR_HumanoidHybrids_Forbidden.description: Humanoid experimentation is despicable, an absolutely unforgivable sin. We will not tolerate having such monstrosities running around the colony.
LanguageData.GR_HumanoidHybrids_Disliked.label: disliked
LanguageData.GR_HumanoidHybrids_Accepted.label: accepted
LanguageData.GR_HumanoidHybrids_Accepted.description: Humanoid experimentation is just another tool at our disposal.
